page.title: 20Things we like
page.content: I like best my mum, dad, sister and our dog Benjy. I like going through an old scrap-book and looking at pictures of Princess Diana and seeing what clothes she wore and where. I like listening to Top of the Pops and hearing what is number one. My favourite meal is chips in newspaper, and I also like burnt bacon for my tea.My favourite afters on a Sunday is apple pie. I like going on holiday and then I like coming home.I like to swim and sunbathe on the beach. When I get home from a holiday, within a week, I am usually reading a C.S. Lewis book Other things I like are roller and ice skating, which I do mostly in the summer.On a hot summers day I like to go into the back garden and have a cold drink, especially lemonade.
